verbs.description: [ARG1: The US President] [V: is] [ARG2: at Singapore 's government house] [ARGM-ADV: with the country 's leader Lee Hsien Loong ( pictured together )] [ARGM-ADV: finalising preparations before the historic Trump - Kim summit] .

The US President is at Singapore 's government house with [ARG1: the country 's leader Lee Hsien Loong] ( [V: pictured] [ARGM-MNR: together] ) finalising preparations before the historic Trump - Kim summit .
